nodes.text: Ewok Jerky was a dish made using the meat of Ewoks, a sentient species native to the forest moon of Endor who were hunted by offworld raiders in order to make the dish. A popular snack on Outer Rim worlds, it was served by the chef Borkus at Power Sliders, a diner built in the settlement of Pons Ora on the planet Abafar.
Ewok Jerky was first mentioned in Aurebesh on a menu in "Missing in Action," the twelfth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' fifth season.
